title: Erdős Problem #4
description: Is it true that, for any ..., there are infinitely many ... such that\[p_{n+1}-p_n> C{(\log\log \log n)^2}\log n?\]

overview.historicalContext: Erdős Problem #4 from erdosproblems.com. Originally offered with a prize of $10000.
overview.problemStatement: Is it true that, for any $C>0$, there are infinitely many $n$ such that\[p_{n+1}-p_n> C\frac{\log\log n\log\log\log\log n}{(\log\log \log n)^2}\log n?\]
